content.body: What is our current process with respect to web platform integration and the stage process? Do we need full web integration by stage 2.7, or Stage 3? Asking because AsyncContext seems almost ready for advancement to 2.7, with the one missing piece being full DOM integration (specifically, understanding which AsyncContext snapshot various callbacks are called in).
(significant progress has been made, but it's not at a complete conclusion that everyone can sign off on)
